info.title: SAIDATA API Documentation

post.description: Authenticate user with campus SSO credentials and receive JWT tokens

items.example: The password must be at least 6 characters.

post.description: Invalidate JWT token and clear refresh token
Get a new access token using refresh token from cookie (token rotation enabled)

Set-Cookie.description: New HTTP-only refresh token cookie (token rotation)
Clears the invalid refresh token cookie

get.description: Retrieve a specific form by ID

post.description: Endpoint untuk menerima hasil survey dari frontend

get.description: Retrieve the payload (answers) for a specific submission
Retrieve a specific payload by ID

get.summary: Get all versions of a form
get.description: Retrieve all versions for a specific form

post.description: Create a new version for a form

get.description: Retrieve user profile by user ID

bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token in format: Bearer {token}
